participant_1.background:
I love to edit videos and spend time with my pug on rainy days.
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
if things are not done right i will redo them again and again.
i sleep most of the day.
I spend my free time fixing up junk cars and making YouTube videos about it.

participant_2.background:
I have a house with a large yard for my paps to hunt mushrooms.
my wife works as a diesel mechanic.
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.
i never knew my dad.
I have a journal that I've been writing in since I was a teenager

content.text: Hello there! What are you up to today?
I am fixing up junk cars. How about you?
I am editing videos and spending time with my pug.
That sounds like fun. I like dogs but I can't have one because my wife is allergic.
I am so sorry to hear that. I have had my pug for 10 years and he is my best friend.
I can imagine. Do you have any other pets?
I have a cat but he is pretty indifferent to me.
I like cats but my wife is allergic to them too.
That is a shame. I am sorry to hear that. Do you have any hobbies?
I write in a journal every day.
That is cool. I used to write in a journal but I fell out of the habit.
I have been writing in mine since I was a teenager. I find it to be very therapeutic.
I can see why. It is a good way to express your thoughts and feelings.
I agree. It is also a good way to remember things.
That is true.
So, what do you do for a living?
I am a teacher.
Oh, that is cool. What grade do you teach?
I teach high school English.
That is awesome. I bet you have a lot of fun with that.
I do, I love working with teenagers.
That is great. I am glad you enjoy your job.
Thank you. I am
